Test HTML Page

This HTML page is used to test that nofollow links have been inserted correctly.

It contains a number of links. Here's one without a hostname. Here is an external one, with no rel attribute. Here is one that already has a rel attribute, which should be preserved. And here is one that already includes nofollow, which must not be repeated.

Finally, here is a list of links we will skip, depending on what the current domain is:
